titleStmt.title: And they shall look upon him whom they have pierced and they shall mourn for him as one mourneth for an onely &c, and shall be in bitterness for him as one is in bitterness for his first born.
titleStmt.author: Eleanor, Lady, d. 1652.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Lady Eleanor Douglas by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
